channel.title: Help me! asap!
channel.description: Okay, Guys Again.. Server Is Still Not Online... Please Help Me. I Already Portforwarded, Set Environmental Tabs, Got No-Ip, Ect Please Help.

item.title: Help me! asap!
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

I’m sure you have done these already but im just gana try to state everything that i think could be the problem.
-make sure you have port forwarded correctly
-make sure you did your no-ip and added the no-ip into the client
-make sure the client and server is set the port you forwarded(i think thats either server or client sided but not both idk i forget)
-make sure the port is open in your firewall

i know i probably dint help but i tried:)

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! asap!
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

if you’r trying to get it online did you even change the server and client ip to your no-ip host?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! asap!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

fltye:

I had this issue to. try port forwerding port 80 it worked wonders for me.

HTTP? That’s JaGeX.

Perses, do you have a modem and a router? If so, portforward them both, check your firewalls, they can remain on, just allow incoming connections on your port.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! asap!
item.dc:creator: @fltye fltye
item.description:
@fltye wrote:

[quote=“Perses Pkers, post:10, topic:372325”][quote author=fltye link=topic=468379.msg3424381#msg3424381 date=1291780342]
When connecting to your server you have to use the 127.0.0.1 others can connect with your IP tell me your server IP and ill test it out
[/quote]You A Idiot…[/quote]

I just love how you call me an idiot for this. All I did was try and help you some people do knot know you need to connect with this so I thought hmmm mabey hes having this issue. So fuck you I dont see how you exptect people to help when you wont take the advice even if you know it already. All I have to say to you is good day and fuck you
